issue.body:

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.google.com/search?client=firefox-b-1-d&q=ereader](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com%2Fsearch%3Fclient%3Dfirefox-b-1-d%26q%3Dereader) ### Comment > Cutting Amazon's annoying ad background is good, but now all of Amazon is unusable. No search bar or anything. Username: `@Aetre` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/4flmq3155xgkc4g8o404gcgs4840400ncgqvmtn800.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/3qelc7qlqoo4wkgwscwsk8s4o4o40gofhk3s657ugo.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v4.4.41 System version: | Windows 11 Browser: | Firefox Tracking protection: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Other:
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion Browsing Security: | disabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Other extensions used: | N/A
